crypto_elements.implementation: ECDSA signature generation with P-256 curve

crypto_elements.description: SHA-1 hash function with known collision vulnerabilities
Standard NIST P-256 elliptic curve parameters

primary_weakness: ECDSA is completely broken by Shor's algorithm and SHA-1 has practical collision attacks
additional_notes: Combination of quantum-vulnerable ECC and cryptographically broken SHA-1 makes this highly vulnerable
